job.title: Software Developer - Growth Architect
job.description: ltpgtwe are seeking a software developer growth architect who realizes that the biggest accomplishments are performed by teams and who therefore aspires to learn what it takes to lead web technology teams our ideal candidate is both incredibly capable with modern web technologies and principles css typescript react jamstack factor and also deeply passionate about being on a successful growing teamltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtbecause you are considerate and thoughtfulyet straightforward and directothers naturally want to partner with you to solve problems as important as your code and technical knowledge which is top notch although you would never say this out loud is your innate understanding of how to build effective relationships on your teamltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtyou will be working alongside talented tightknit team members during a period of growth proving to the team your ability to execute our work more efficiently and more progressively than ever before because the team trusts you you will have the ability to transform and upgrade how we deliver technology results this role has unlimited growth potential within the organizationltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtthis role reports to the director of engineeringltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtprimary responsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtwrite clear well organized robust code with maintainability and scalability in mindltligtltligtdeliver work on time while employing a patient attention to detail produce highquality resultsltligtltligtkeep your word balance the freedom afforded this position with the responsibility to delivery resultsltligtltligtdisplay a mature attitude towards progress invite new technologies and methods while caring for the future path of legacy applications and functionalityltligtltligtachieve team and technology resultsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtqualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt years experience in software development for the webltligtltligtstrong experience with responsive web design development principlesltligtltligtstrong experience with and understanding of core front end web technologies and methodologies js html css including scss sassltligtltligtstrong experience with at least one front end framework and its associated patterns eg vue reactltligtltligtdemonstrated understanding of factor principlesltligtltligtstrong troubleshooting skillsltligtltligtexperience with cicd creating and improving build release run processes with common toolsltligtltligtexperience with popular enterprise ecommerce platforms shopify plus bigcommerce commercetools a plusltligtltligtvery comfortable with version control concepts and software specifically gitltligtltligtexcellent verbal and written communication skillsltligtltligtexcellent interpersonal skillsltligtltligtability to handle multiple competing priorities and meet deadlinesltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt
